data.body: when we prompt agents for Take/Scene/Direct, we don't need to give them a full bead show dump - agents know how to query beads.  Just give them the bead ids.
data.description: when we prompt agents for Take/Scene/Direct, we don't need to give them a full bead show dump - agents know how to query beads.  Just give them the bead ids.
data.title: prompt tightening
